    Struct PubSubOptions

    Options for NetworkTables publishers and subscribers. Controls behavior such as update frequency, storage, and filtering.

    Inherited Members
    ValueType.Equals(object)
    ValueType.GetHashCode()
    ValueType.ToString()
    object.Equals(object, object)
    object.GetType()
    object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)
    Namespace: QuestNav.Native.NTCore
    Assembly: QuestNav.dll
    Syntax
    public struct PubSubOptions

    Properties

    AllDefault

    Default publisher/subscriber options with reasonable defaults for most use cases.

    Declaration
    public static PubSubOptions AllDefault { get; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    PubSubOptions

    DisableLocal

    For subscriptions, if local value updates should not be queued for ReadQueue(). See also DisableRemote. If true, updates from the local client (same NetworkTables instance) will not be stored in the queue.

    Declaration
    public bool DisableLocal { readonly get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    bool

    DisableRemote

    For subscriptions, if remote value updates should not be queued for ReadQueue(). See also DisableLocal. If true, updates from remote clients (other NetworkTables instances) will not be stored in the queue.

    Declaration
    public bool DisableRemote { readonly get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    bool

    ExcludePublisher

    For subscriptions, if non-zero, value updates for ReadQueue() are not queued for this publisher. Use this to exclude updates from a specific publisher by its handle/ID.

    Declaration
    public uint ExcludePublisher { readonly get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    uint

    ExcludeSelf

    For entries, don't queue (for ReadQueue) value updates for the entry's internal publisher. If true, updates published by the same entry that is also subscribing will not be queued for ReadQueue().

    Declaration
    public bool ExcludeSelf { readonly get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    bool

    Hidden

    For subscriptions, don't share the existence of the subscription with the network. Note this means updates will not be received from the network unless another subscription overlaps with this one, and the subscription will not appear in metatopics. Useful for internal monitoring without affecting network traffic.

    Declaration
    public bool Hidden { readonly get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    bool

    KeepDuplicates

    Preserve duplicate value changes (rather than ignoring them). If false, consecutive identical values are filtered out. If true, all value updates are preserved even if they contain the same data.

    Declaration
    public bool KeepDuplicates { readonly get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    bool

    Periodic

    How frequently changes will be sent over the network, in seconds. NetworkTables may send more frequently than this (e.g. use a combined minimum period for all values) or apply a restricted range to this value. The default is 100 ms (0.1 seconds).

    Declaration
    public double Periodic { readonly get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    double

    PollStorage

    Polling storage size for a subscription. Specifies the maximum number of updates NetworkTables should store between calls to the subscriber's ReadQueue() function. If zero, defaults to 1 if SendAll is false, 20 if SendAll is true.

    Declaration
    public uint PollStorage { readonly get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    uint

    PrefixMatch

    Perform prefix match on subscriber topic names. Is ignored/overridden by Subscribe() functions; only present in struct for the purposes of getting information about subscriptions. When true, the subscription will match all topics that start with the specified name prefix.

    Declaration
    public bool PrefixMatch { readonly get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    bool

    SendAll

    Send all value changes over the network. If false, only the latest value is sent when the periodic timer expires. If true, all value changes are sent as they occur.

    Declaration
    public bool SendAll { readonly get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    bool

    TopicsOnly

    For subscriptions, don't ask for value changes (only topic announcements). If true, the subscriber will only receive notifications when topics are created or destroyed, but not when their values change.

    Declaration
    public bool TopicsOnly { readonly get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    bool

    Methods

    ToNative()

    Converts this managed PubSubOptions to the native NativePubSubOptions structure used by the NetworkTables native library.

    Declaration
    public NativePubSubOptions ToNative()
    Returns
    Type Description
    NativePubSubOptions

    A NativePubSubOptions struct with equivalent settings
